block.p: WIESEN-Irving. Devoted husband of Tobie A. Loving father of Barbara Prager & Jeremy Lester Wiesen. Grandfather of Karen Balliett (Will), Emily Prager and Gavin B. Wiesen. Great-grandfather of Adelaide and Charlotte. Brother to Eleanor Leff. Graveside service to be held.

WIESEN-Irving. NCJW New York Section mourns the loss of Irving Wiesen, husband of former Board member Tobie Wiesen, longtime supporter. Sincerest condolences to the family. Rita Fishman, President Judith Golub, Exec. Dir.
